channel.title: I need a trustworthy person to host my server
channel.description: Because the last one was mean and ip banned me from my own server my ports are blocked thats why i cant host.

item.title: I need a trustworthy person to host my server
item.dc:creator: @dslayer40 dslayer40
item.description:
@dslayer40 wrote:

Correct, please put some time and effort into server coding. There are so many Tutorials and players that would gladly help you here. Please go to the Tutorial section of the forums and start editing the source to make it “yours”.

Read full topic
item.source: I need a trustworthy person to host my server

item.title: I need a trustworthy person to host my server
item.dc:creator: @dslayer40 dslayer40
item.description:
@dslayer40 wrote:

Please give people some time. Also just asking for a hoster might not bring attention. Just a suggestion but you may want to include some more information and/or even screen shots.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a trustworthy person to host my server
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Anti Pizza, post:1, topic:155949”]Because the last one was mean and ip banned me from my own server my ports are blocked thats why i cant host.[/quote]Then why not unblock your ports? Don’t say you cant, because you can. You might say it wont work, it does, you’re just doing it wrong.
